start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT id,username,`password`,status FROM user_info WHERE username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status = "1"
